Hardcover with Dust Jacket. Condition: Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Good. First Edition. Hardcover with brown boards and pictorial dust jacket, first edition, 636gms, 381 pages, white endpapers. Book is in good condition with minor general wear and tear and moderate page discolouration/spotting throughout. There is a stamp from a previous owner on the inside front half-title page. Boards and dust jacket are in good condition with mild shelf wear and scuffing, otherwise no other pre-loved markings. Seller Inventory # SCIFIC1073
